Title: Controller's Message
Description: We are living in the era of Big Data. With billions of gigabytes of data created every day, we have a historic opportunity to make our government faster, more efficient, and transparent. But just having data is not enough – we need Smart Data.  And for the City of Los Angeles, Smart Data starts here: at ControlPanel LA.

Title: LA City Controller's Tech Bullpen
Description: Join the Controller's Tech Bullpen - a forum for civic & tech leaders to connect & innovate with local government.

Title: DataLA
Description: Visit data.lacity.org to view datasets from across the City of Los Angeles.

Title: Payroll - Now with Overtime, Bonuses, Healthcare Costs and More
Description:
This is the most comprehensive picture to date of the City's total payroll costs. 
 
 Many new payroll details are now readily available - including overtime costs across City Departments, average healthcare costs, various types of bonuses and lump sum payments that make up a City employee’s pay - for both full and part-time personnel.

Title: We're on Github
Description: Click here to visit the LA City Controller's Github account.

Title: Questions?
Description: Need help navigating Control PanelLA? Click here for helpful tips and resources.

Title: Women @ Work
Description: Click here to view an infographic on the status of women in LA City government.
